nodes.text: Model 1010 Photo-reactive Personal Armor was a suit of armor manufactured by Krail Armory. The armor was covered in a photo-reactive coating composed of microscopic crystals that reflected the colors of any given area, making the armor blend in with the environment. The basic suit was considered to be illegal for sale on most planets.
The bounty hunter Mist wore a modified version of the armor during the early years of the New Republic.
The stats given for the Model 1010 Photo-reactive Armor in The Kathol Outback are for a modified suit. No stats for the basic suit exist.
